name.ja: <ruby>光道の龍<rt>ドラグーン・オブ・ライトロード</rt></ruby>

text.en: If you have a "Lightsworn" monster in your GY: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. If this card is Special Summoned: You can send 1 "Lightsworn" card from your Deck to the GY, except "Dragon of Lightsworn". If this card is sent to the GY: You can add 1 Dragon monster with 3000 ATK/2600 DEF from your Deck to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Dragon of Lightsworn" once per turn.
